channel.title: Posts on Jumba la Makutano
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jumba la Makutano

item.title: Nafasi na Kisa cha Rohoni
item.description: NAFASI NA KISA CHA ROHONI (YA WOKOVU). Wagalatia 6:10 Waebrania 12:17 Nafasi ni nini? Akida Hamisi na waandishi wenzake (1981) katika Kamusi Ya Kiswahili Sanifu amefafanua kuwa Nafasi ni mahali palipo patupu na ambapo panaweza kuwekwa kitu. Oxford (2019) pia wafafanual neno nafasi kuwa ni eneo hali au mazingira yanayoruhusu au yanayo achilia uwezekano wa kitu kingine ama cha aina ileile kupata sehemu ya kukaa, kuishi, au kuwepo.

item.title: The Church: Pillars and Foundation of the Truth
item.description: How you view the church will determine how you view the Kingdom of God. The Kingdom of God is seen in and through the church. The church is what Jesus is building to bring forth the Kingdom of God upon the earth. When you believe the church is the manifestation of Godâ€™s Kingdom upon the earth and seek to build it you will reap the rewards of a blessed life now and in the age to come.

item.title: The Bible Dictionary
item.description: A Bible dictionary is a reference work containing encyclopedic entries related to the Bible, typically concerning people, places, customs, doctrine and Biblical criticism. Bible dictionaries can be scholarly or popular in tone. A Bible dictionary is a reference work containing encyclopedic entries related to the Bible, typically concerning people, places, customs, doctrine and Biblical criticism. Bible dictionaries can be scholarly or popular in tone. Daniel Semba A Bible dictionary is a reference work containing encyclopedic entries related to the Bible, typically concerning people, places, customs, doctrine and Biblical criticism.
